body.raw:
## Overview

A mobile ordering solution for restaurants that uses 2D barcodes at tables to start an order.

## Technologies

- React
- NextJS
- TailwindCSS
- Shadcn UI
- WebUSB Printing/ Windows driver printing
- NodeJS
- REST

## Tasks

- Build responsive UI with React + TailwindCSS + Shadcn UI
- Integrate backend REST APIs and design database structure
- Handle printings
- Prepare deployment pipeline

## Screenshots

- https://via.placeholder.com/150
- https://via.placeholder.com/150

## 概覽

在餐桌放置二維條碼，顧客掃描後即可開始點餐的行動點餐方案。

## 技術

- React
- Bootstrap
- Express
- REST

## 任務

- 使用 React + Bootstrap 打造響應式 UI
- 串接後端 REST API
- 建置部署流程

## 截圖

- https://via.placeholder.com/150
- https://via.placeholder.com/150

## Overview

An online forum project for discussions. (Known 404 issue on first load — a refresh fixes it.)

## Technologies

- Next.js
- CSS
- JavaScript
- MongoDB (planned)

## Tasks

- Design a responsive forum UI
- Implement authentication
- Set up MongoDB for data storage

document.title: Good-Forum (吹水台)
document.subtitle: LIHKG-style forum clone with mobile-first UX

body.raw:
**Overview**  
A lightweight forum inspired by LIHKG. It focuses on fast browsing without login, then gated actions (reply/post) via centered auth modals.

**Notable UX**

- Route structure: `/category/[id]` with **0** = 吹水台 (all threads).
- Left drawer for categories (like LIHKG).
- Unauthenticated users can read; **reply/post requires login**.
- **Centered** login & signup modals, unified toasts (Toastify) for feedback.

**Tech**

- Next.js + Tailwind + **shadcn/ui**
- MongoDB database named **`good-forum`**
- Toastify for status updates

**Next Steps**

- Pagination & infinite scroll
- Rate limit & moderation tools
- Rich editor with image upload

## Overview

A Next.js + Tailwind CSS app to browse movies by trending and top-rated categories, powered by TMDB.

## Technologies

- Next.js
- Tailwind CSS

## Tasks

- Design & build responsive UI with React + Tailwind
- Integrate TMDB API for movie data
- Deploy on Vercel

## Screenshots

- `/movie.png`
- `/movie1.png`

## 概覽

以 Next.js + Tailwind CSS 製作的電影瀏覽網站，提供熱門與高分分類，資料來自 TMDB。

## 技術

- Next.js
- Tailwind CSS

## 任務

- 使用 React + Tailwind 打造響應式 UI
- 串接 TMDB API
- 部署於 Vercel

## 截圖

- `/movie.png`

body.raw:
**What it is**  
A React single-page portfolio built with MUI **Joy UI** components. Sections include Profile, About Me (with modal background), and a filterable portfolio grid.

**Highlights**

- Clean, card-driven layout using Joy UI `Sheet`, `Grid`, and `Typography`.
- Social bar, scroll-down indicator, and modal background component.
- Simple category filter (All/Web/App/Design) for portfolio items.

**Tech**

- React (JSX), Vite
- MUI Joy UI
- Responsive CSS

**What I improved next**  
This version established the content + structure later migrated into 4.0 with Next.js, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, and i18n.

body.raw:
**Goal**  
Modernize my portfolio with a production-ready stack and better content management.

**Key Features**

- **Next.js (App Router)** with Contentlayer for MDX projects.
- **Tailwind + shadcn/ui** (theme toggle, soft micro-animations).
- **EN / 中文** from day one; copy and navigation localized.
- On-page résumé preview with **Download/Print** action.
- Migrated components & ideas from 3.0 (ProfileSection, AboutMeSection, BackgroundModal, PortfolioSection).

**Tech**

- Next.js, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, Contentlayer
- JSX (no TS per preference)
- Light/Dark theme respecting reduced-motion

**Roadmap**

- Polish animations, add more project case studies, integrate contact form with rate limiting.
